channel.title: Frozen on Loading - Please Wait
channel.description:
I can find servers to which I can log in, but they always seem to freeze me on the Loading - Please wait screen. Do I need to download something to stop this?
Also, does moparscape need to be on a certain port?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 23, 2006, 07:07:02 PM[/size][hr]I'd like to add I'm using 2.1 because 3 doesn't work for me.
